Other members the group RESTAURATION have need of a loan for businesses such as selling charcoal and grocery items. Francisque says his main challenge is to expand his enterprise. He says his main goal is to become a businessman.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell

loans.name: Ángela María

texts.es:
Ángela es originaria de la bella ciudad de Estelí conocida como el diamante de las Segovia ubicada geográficamente en el norte de Nicaragua, su estado civil es soltera y tiene una hija mayor de edad e independiente , Ángela se caracteriza por ser una persona trabajadora, honrada y con buenos valores morales.

Con los créditos obtenidos anteriormente han sido de gran importancia ya que realizado mejora en su vivienda y ha resuelto algunos problemas personales.
Actualmente se desempeña como kardista de una empresa desde hace más de 24 años  y su función es llevar el control del inventario en existencia.

Con el monto financiado lo va destinar para la compra de materiales de construcción tales como cemento ladrillo y arena ya que va realizar mejora en su vivienda.
Ángela agradece a kiva por el apoyo  brindado ya que de esta manera podrá mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ángela's from the beautiful city of Estelí, located in the north of Nicaragua and known as "The Diamond of the Segovias."  She's single and has an adult daughter who's independent.  Ángela's a hardworking and honorable person with good moral values.

Her previous loans have been very important because she has made improvements on her home and resolved some personal problems.

Currently she has worked in inventory control for a business for more than 24 years.

She's going to use the loan to buy construction supplies such as cement, bricks, and sand to make improvements on her house.  Ángela's grateful to Kiva for this support because she'll be able to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and bricks

loans.name: Sarhad

texts.en: Mr. Sarhad is 58 years old and lives with his wife and four children in a small house in the Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia. His wife, Erkejan, is retired, and she helps her husband to herd their livestock. His older children graduated from the university and have started working, and the youngest daughter, Aigerim, is 19 and currently studying at university. Sarhad has been breeding livestock since 2009 and has a lot of experience. He is now planning on purchasing livestock in the countryside to breed them for meat. He is applying for a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy livestock from country herders and prepare forage for his livestock. He is a hardworking and friendly man.

loans.use: to buy livestock from country herders and prepare forage to feed his livestock.

loans.name: Fely

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Fely works hard to support her family.

She sells charcoal in the Philippines and earns additional income from a general store. Fely is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Fely has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of providing a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, four of whom are in school, Nida works hard to support her family. She sells charcoal in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending.  


Nida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She is now requesting a new loan for PHP 16000 to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. Nida hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Vivina

texts.en:
Vivina, a 54-year-old married mother of three, works hard to provide for her family. She has been running a general store in the Philippines for eight years, and earns additional income from food vending.



The recipient of 18 previous loans from NWTF, all since repaid, Vivina has requested a new one for PHP 14000 to purchase additional items to sell such as soap, canned goods, spices, soft drinks, etc. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like soap, canned goods, spices, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Annalisa

texts.en:
This is Annalisa. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy the products she needed for her variety store. Her income from the business helped her with  the education of her child and their household expenditures. As a widow, she is continuously working to provide for her family. She would like to apply for another loan, of 18,000 PHP, to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to cover her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. Annalisa dreams of expanding her business and hopes to have their own house and lot. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed for her business.

loans.name: Rayda

texts.es: Rayda, de 47 años, está casada con Mauro, de 46 años de edad. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo viven con el último de ellos en su casa propia. Hace 30 años que se dedica a la siembra de papa y alverja, lo que después de cada cosecha los comercializa en el marcado mayorista de su ciudad; pero ahora su dedicación y esfuerzo se multiplicaron ya que su esposo, y fiel compañero, está trabajando en una empresa de construcción de una hidroeléctrica, dejándola sola en el cuidado de sus cultivos, pero Rayda, tiene pensando contratar trabajadores del lugar, para que le ayuden a sembrar papa para está temporada, y de esa manera poder dedicarle más tiempo al cuidado de sus animales; entre cerdos, toros, burros y corderos.Este es su cuarto crédito con KIVA, donde espera el apoyo financiero necesario para lograr sus planes. Además promete pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas. Rayda, invertirá los S/.1500 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Rayda, age 47, is married to Mauro, age 46. They have 4 children, but only the youngest lives in their home. For thirty years, she has worked by farming potatoes and peas. Following each harvest, she sells them in the wholesale market in her city.  Now the dedication and efforts required of her are multiplied because her spouse and faithful companion is working at a company constructing a hydroelectric plant, leaving her to care for the crops alone. Rayda is considering hiring workers to help her to plant potatoes this season. In this way she could dedicate more time to the care of her animals, including pigs, bulls, donkeys and lambs.

This is her fourth loan with Kiva, where she seeks the financial support necessary to achieve her plans. Additionally, she promises to make her payments promptly. Rayda will invest 1,500 soles in the purchase of organic fertilizer to nourish her fields.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Nery

texts.es:
Nery es un hombre de 24 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus padres, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Nery no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Mecánica que deseaba.
Por iniciativa propia, Nery trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación.
Nery se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprara una moto lineal de segunda mano, la cual utilizara para transportarse desde su hogar hasta su centro de trabajo, así el podrá ahorrar un poco de dinero en transporte y lo utilizará poder estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Nery, 24, is single and lives with his parents in the Imperial area of the city of Cañete.  He's a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic man with a big desire for self-improvement.  Unfortunately, because he lacks the economic resources and needs to work, Nery hasn't been able to study mechanical engineering as he would like.

On his own initiative, Nery works as a farm laborer on a farm in his city.  He works approximately 10 hours every day.  He believes it's going well for him because of his dedication.

Nery's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll buy a used linear motorcycle to get from home to work.  This way he'll be able to save a little money on transportation to pay for his professional studies.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business farming vegetables in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. Florence has been in this business for four years. Florence earns additional income from buying and selling nipa (palm thatch) roofing. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now applying for a new loan to further build her business. Florence has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda is 63 years old, a widow with eight children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Yolanda is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. In the picture, you can see bags of fertilizer that will be used for her farm. Yolanda has been farming rice for three years, and she earns additional income from a general store. She works tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other supplies for her rice farm.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: As a married parent of six children, Rowena works hard to support her family. She has a food-vending business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish. Rowena is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional supplies for her food-vending business. Rowena has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional supplies for her business.

loans.name: Realyn

texts.en: Realyn is 27 years old, married, and has two children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Realyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more fertilizer and farm supplies. Realyn has been farming rice for three years, and she earns additional income from rice retailing. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizer and farm supplies.

loans.name: Lamentation De Philibert Group

texts.fr:
Modelline est la coordinatrice de son groupe Lamentation de Geremy. Elle habite dans la région de Trou-du-Nord d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Elle a dirigé son commerce de restaurant pendant les 65 dernières années. Elle a 3 enfants. 

Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans le Restaurant, elle a acheter de la nourriture pour votre restaurant. Des autres membres du groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre des produits alimentaires, cosmétiques, vêtements, chaussureset du charbon. Modeline dit que son défi principal est en mesure de vendre plus depuis la crise économique en Haïti ne reçoit pas beaucoup d'argent.
texts.en:
Modelline is the coordinator of her group "Lamentation de Geremy". She lives in the Trou-du-Nord region, in Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is very limited. She has been running her restaurant business for the last five or six years. She has three children. 

Modelline would like to use this loan to invest in the restaurant. She has to purchase food for her restaurant. The other members of the group need a loan for such businesses as selling grocery items, cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and charcoal. Modelline says her main challenge is to be able to sell more. With the economic crisis in Haiti, there has not been very much money.

loans.use: to purchase food for her restaurant

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is 45 years old, married, and has eight children. Elsa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has applied for a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell, such as soap, milk, sugar and noodles. Elsa has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns income from rice retailing. Elsa aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her store, such as soap, milk, sugar and noodles.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en: As a married parent of two children, Eva works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from buying and selling dried coconut meat. Eva is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy more fishing materials for her business. Eva has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fishing materials.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean is 41 years old, married, and has four children, who are in school. Jean is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Jean applied for a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies. Jean has been farming vegetables for 15 years, and she has borrowed 30 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Jean would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina nació en la provincia de Paucartambo y vive junto con su familia, ella tiene 26 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella es una persona  trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica principal es la venta de comida, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras, fideos y carne, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Martina was born in the province of Paucartambo and lives with her family. She is 26 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. From this relationship she has one child.  She is a hardworking and enterprising person who is getting her family ahead through the efforts of her work. Her main job is selling food. Because she is a responsible person, she was invited to join the communal bank, Llapallanchis Llankasunchis. At this point, she needs a loan to buy consumable goods such as vegetables, beans, and meat. She is thankful for and values the loan and she has committed herself to making her monthly payments in a responsible way.

loans.use: to buy consumable goods such as vegetables, beans, and meat.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase household goods to sell in her general store, like canned goods, milk, coffee, noodles, and eggs.

Erlinda has been in this business for six years. She earns additional income from raising pigs.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase household goods to sell, like canned goods, milk, coffee, noodles, and eggs.

loans.name: Mercelita

texts.en: As a married parent of two children, Mercelita works hard to support her family. She has a general store in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from selling prepaid mobile phone loads. Mercelita is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her store, such as soap, shampoo, milk, sugar, coffee and canned goods. Mercelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her store, such as soap, shampoo, milk, sugar, coffee and canned goods.

loans.name: Tet Fret De Dumas Group

texts.fr:
Antoine est le coordinateur de son groupe Tet Fret de Dumas. Il est un commercant. Il habite dans la région de Dumas où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité. Antoine a dirigé son commerce de produit divers et charbon pendant 11 années. Avant de commencer ce commerce Antoine était un Etudiant.

Antoine voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans le charbon etc. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres militant ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme nourriture, cosmetiques, charbon, etc. Antoine dit que son but principal et son rêve c'est possède un gros business avec son fond et par la grâce de Dieu.
texts.en:
Antoine is the coodinator of his group "Tet Fret de Dumas". He is a merchant and lives in the Dumas region, where electricity is rare and potable water is very limited. He has been running his business selling a variety of goods and charcoal for eleven years. Before starting this business, he was a student.

Antoine would like to use this loan to invest in charcoal, etc. He hopes that this loan will help him to expand his business. Other active members have need of a loan for such businesses as selling food, cosmetic products, charcoal, etc.  Antoine says his main goal and dream is to own a big business using his funds and by the grace of God.

loans.use: to purchase various goods and charcoal to sell

loans.name: Merlin

texts.en:
Merlin works hard to support her family. She is married and she has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Merlin requested a PHP 12,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy fishing materials, like fishing net and other materials used for her business.

Merlin has been in this business for ten years now.

In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials, like fishing net and other materials used for her business.

loans.name: Ena Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña  Ena de 59 años de edad  reside en casa propia con su hija y su yerno,  es una excelente persona trabajadora y muy responsable tiene un negocio de venta de tortillas en cual ella ha sabido ganarse la confianza de mucha clientela por la calidad de sus productos  y su amabilidad,  de igual manera realiza lo que es venta de tamales, doña Ena está solicitando un crédito  para poder realizar la compra de lo que son unos productos como : maíz, cal, y gas y así aumentar sus ganancias y su producción y poder alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ena, age 59, lives in her own house with her daughter and son-in-law. She is an excellent, hardworking, and very responsible person. She has a business selling tortillas and has gained the confidence of a large clientele due to the quality of her products and her friendliness. In a similar vein, she also sells tamales.  Ena is asking for a loan to buy products such as corn, lime, and gas. In this way, she can increase her earnings and production and can achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime, and gas.

loans.name: Djebeleton  1 Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe  DJEBELETON 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à TAMARO, un des villages de la commune de DAH cercle de SAN de la  4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 2eme prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé à été bien remboursé.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide  avec  NAGAGNIRE, 1ere  femme debout  de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à SAN, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 95.000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the group "DJEBELETON I" are married women, who average 45 years of age and four children each, all living in traditional families in TAMARO, a village in Commune de DAH, Cercle de SAN, in the 4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali. The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry  out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their second loan with the institution. The past loans were indeed paid back. 

The crop grown is peanuts, as is the case with NAGAGNIRE, who is standing first from the right in the photo. With her loan, she intends to purchase some farm inputs, seeds, and tools and to pay for plowing to maintain 0.5 hectare.

After the harvest, the produce is sold to men and women customers in the village and in SAN. She plans on making an average profit of 95,000 francs CFA at the end of planting. This profit will enable her to pay back the loan and also to help her husband to cover day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing and to purchase farm inputs, tools, and seeds

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi a pour activité principale la revente de produits d’alimentation générale qu’elle pratique à la maison. Elle a 03 enfants tous scolarisés dont le premier est âgé de 12 ans et le dernier a 6 ans. Épouse de cuisinier, et âgée de 42 ans, elle sollicite son quatrième crédit auprès de notre institution(WAGES) pour l’achat de produits d’alimentation générale afin de renforcer son commerce. Elle désire assurer la réussite de ses enfants en investissant les bénéfices de ses activités dans leurs études.
texts.en: Afi's main source of revenue comes from her business selling general food products from her home. She is 42 years old and married to a cook. The couple have three children aged six to 12 who all go to school. Afi is seeking a fourth loan from WAGES to strengthen her business by stocking up on general food products. She wants to ensure her children’s success by investing the money she earns into their education.

loans.use: to buy general food products.

loans.name: Naranhuu

texts.en:
Mr. Naranhuu is 26 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a ger, a traditional nomadic tent, in the Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia. His wife, Farida, stays home, taking care of their six-month-old son, Erhulan, and 5-year-old daughter, Guljan. 

Naranhuu has been providing a taxi service business in town with his car for last two years and he has already built regular customers. He is planning to build a house, so his family can live in a decent place since they have a newborn and they need to stay warm during the harsh and cold Mongolian winter. 

Naranhuu is now requesting loan of MNT 1,600,000 to purchase construction and insulation materials and vacuum windows, to build his house with less heat loss and coal consumption during the winter. He is a hard-working, responsible, and diligent man.

loans.use: to purchase construction and insulation materials and vacuum windows, to build his house with less heat loss and coal consumption during the winter.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les femmes du groupe DANAYA  ont  en moyenne 43  ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes la ville de TENE dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Elles font l’achat la restauration sous toutes ses formes et  l’achat vente de diverses marchandises. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur 14 e prêt solidaire.
Madame, NANA ( 2 eme debout de la droite vers la gauche) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 300 kg de riz, 50 litres d’huile, un carton de cube maggi,  un  sac d’oignon, un demi sac de l’ail  et une grande quantité d’épices pour la vente. NANA s’approvisionne à la grande foire de San. Elle à une gargote à TENE situe aux abords du goudron. Toutes ses ventes se font  au comptant, en détail  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Elle espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 39000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All of them married in traditional extended families, the women of the group DANAYA average 43 years of age and four children each. The women all live in the city of TENE, in Région de Ségou (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali), and they know one another through ties of community and kinship. They have restaurant businesses of all sorts, and they buy and sell a variety of merchandise.

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their fourteenth solidarity loan. 

Ms. NANA (standing second from the right) intends to use her loan to purchase 300 kg of rice, 50 liters of oil, a box of Maggi bouillon cubes, a sack of onions, a half-sack of garlic, and a large amount of spices to sell. She gets her supplies from the big market in San. She has a casual eatery in TENE located along the road. All of her sales are made retail and in cash to a customer base composed of men and women. 

With this loan, she hopes to make an average monthly profit of 39,000 francs CFA that will be used to reinvest in her business and to meet household needs.

loans.use: to purchase food supplies for her restaurant

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es: Marcela, de 29 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada desde hace 10 años. Marcela se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales menores. Pero su principal actividad económica se centra en la compra y venta de queso, los cuales comercializa a la ciudad de Lima donde viaja de manera permanente. Su trabajo consiste en la compra de queso a los ganaderos productores de su pueblo, cuando recolecta la cantidad que necesita viaja a otra ciudad donde reparte el producto lácteo a los clientes que le solicitaron. Ahora desea aumentar el capital de trabajo pues cada mes tienes más clientes, ya que es una de las pocas que realiza este tipo de negocio, asimismo se encuentra planeando la compra de vacas para que ella misma produzca el queso y así obtenga mayores ganancias. Este es su primer  crédito con KIVA, donde espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr sus planes. Además promete pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas. Marcela, invertirá el dinero en la compra de queso al por mayor para su venta.
texts.en: Marcela is 29 years old and is a simple woman.  She lives with her two children in a rented house and has done so for 10 years.  Marcela is a farmer and raises small animals, but her main income comes from buying and selling cheeses, which she sell in Lima.  She buys cheeses from the farmers who produce them in her village.  When she gathers as much as she needs, she travels to other towns and delivers it to those customers who have placed orders.  She wants to increase her working capital because she has more customers every month, since she is one of the few persons who do this kind of work.  She is also planning to buy some cows so she can also produce her own cheese and increase her profits.  This will be her first loan through Kiva, where she hopes for all your support to achieve her plans.  She also promises to be on time with her payments.  Marcela will use the money to buy chees in quantity.

loans.use: to buy cheese.

loans.name: Djebeleton  2 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  DJEBELETON 2  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à TAMARO, un des villages de la commune de DAH cercle de SAN de la  4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 3eme prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé à été bien remboursé.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide  avec  KADIA, 1er femme debout  de la gauche vers la droite avec foulard blanc sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à SAN, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 125.500FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Djebeleton 2 Group are married women with an average age of 42 years and an average of five children. They are all living in traditional families in Tamaro, a village in the municipality of the Dah cicle of San in the fourth administrative region Mali. They are working with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their agricultural activities during the rainy season. The group is on their third loan with the institution, and their past loans have been repaid in full.

Kadia (shown in the photo with a white scarf and standing on the far left) grows crops of peanuts. With her ​​loan, she intends to buy agricultural inputs, seeds, small agricultural supplies, and pay for the labor needed to maintain one and a half hectares of farmland. After the harvest, her produce will be sold in the village and in San, to a clientele composed of men and women.

She hopes to earn an average revenue of 125,500 Francs CFA by the end of the agricultural season. This income will allow her to repay her loan and also to help her husband with the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs, seeds, small agricultural supplies, and pay for the labor needed to maintain one and a half hectares of farmland.

loans.name: Djamadjigui Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe  DJAMADJIGUI  ont en moyenne 47 ans, 6 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à KIMPARANA  chef du cercle de SAN  de la  quatrième région  administrative du Mali.
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente de produits alimentaires tels les condiments alimentaires,  et la restauration et des boissons non alcoolisées.
les femmes du groupe DJAMADJIGUI sont à leur 13e  prêt solidaire les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.  AWA debout au milieu compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des casiers de boissons de plusieurs qualités.  Elles s’approvisionnent à KOUTIALA hebdomadairement. Elles effectuent ses ventes, sur place à KIMPARANA à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes.
Elles envisagent réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 90 000FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  à la nourriture,  aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women of the group DJAMADJIGUI average 47 years of age and six children each, all living in traditional extended families in KIMPARANA, the main town of Cercle de SAN, in the 4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali. These women know one another through ties of kinship, and they have businesses buying and selling food items, such as condiments and non-alcoholic beverages, and  they have restaurants.

The women of the group DJAMADJIGUI are on their thirteenth solidarity loan. The previous loans were correctly paid back.

AWA, who is standing in the middle in the photo, intends to use her loan to purchase cases of beverages of several qualities. She gets her supplies in KOUTIALA each week. She makes her sales locally in KIMPARANA to a customer base composed of men and women.

She envisions making an average monthly profit  of 90,000 francs CFA that will be used for expenses related to healthcare, food, and schooling costs. The rest will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to purchase beverages (soda) to sell

loans.name: Toribia Berta

texts.es: Toribia nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo y vive  junto con su familia en la misma ciudad, ella tiene 55 años de edad, ella es una persona  trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica principal es la enseñanza, ella es profesora en uno de los colegios de la ciudad de Paucartambo pues es una excelente profesora,  ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para la educación de sus hijos y para mantenimiento de la casa, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Toribia was born in the city of Paucartambo and lives with her family in the same city.  She is 55 years old and is a hardworking and enterprising lady who gets her family ahead through her efforts.  She is a teacher and teaches in one of the schools in Paucartambo.  She is an excellent teacher and a very responsible person, so she was invited into the “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” communal bank.  She needs a loan to pay for her children’s education and to do maintenance on her house.  She is grateful, values the loan, and is committed to making her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to pay tuition for her children and pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Derlin

texts.es: Derlin  tiene  33  años de edad, esta casado y vive con la esposa y tres hijos actualmente. El con crédito pretende comprar  materiales como madera, glavos y unas maquinas para la construcción de muebles. El quiere poder tener un mejor equipo de trabajo para poder hacer mas cantidad  de muebles y con mas detalles y asi poder aumentar sus ventas, y así con su proyecto  poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, el no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja…
texts.en: Derlin is 33 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children.  He will use the money from this loan to buy supplies such as lumber, nails, and some tools to make furniture.  He wants to have better equipment for his work so that he can make more and better detailed furniture, and be able to increase his sales and generate more income for his family.  He doesn’t have the necessary capital because he has limited resources, so he is asking for a loan.  This will be his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has not had previous loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has approved this loan with ease and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo y vive  junto con su familia en la misma ciudad, ella tiene 50 años de edad, ella es una persona  trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica principal es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, pan, gaseosas, cerveza, aceite y otras cosas más, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz y otras cosas más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Maria Elena was born in the city of Paucartambo and lives with her family in the same city.  She is 50 years old and is a hardworking, enterprising woman who gets her family ahead through her work and effort.  She sells basic needs products such as rice, noodles, bread, soft drinks, beer, cooking oil, and other things.  She is a responsible person and so was invited to become part of the “Llapallanchis Llankasunchis” communal bank.  She needs this loan to buy sacks of sugar, rice, and other things  She is grateful for and values the loan and is committed to making her payments on time and responsibly.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Berlin

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Berlin works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines and she also earns additional income from farming rice and vegetables. 

Berlin is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional sacks of charcoal for her buy-and-sell charcoal business.

Berlin has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Komla

texts.fr: Revendeur de téléphones portables, Komla âgé de 30ans est célibataire. C’est en 2009 qu’il exerce cette activité dans une boutique et il s’y plait bien. Il sollicite ce quatrième crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises afin de satisfaire les demandes des clients. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité, l’agrandir et plus tard se marier, fonder une famille.
texts.en: A retailer of mobile phones, Komla, aged 30, is an unmarried man. In 2009, he started operating this business in a store, and he is very happy with it. He is requesting this fourth loan to stock up on merchandise in order to satisfy customer demands. He wants to reinvest in his business, expand it, and get married later to start a family.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones to sell

loans.name: Yawa Massa

texts.fr: Yawa massa exerce comme activité génératrice de revenu le commerce de détail des articles scolaires. Elle fait ce commerce depuis plus de 9 ans, elle a été enseignante et donc elle connait les avantages de faire ce type de commerce. La rentrée des classes est proches et elle veut augmenter ses profits. Elle sollicite de WAGES un quatrième crédit pour acheter divers articles scolaires. Elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants.
texts.en: Yawa Massa has a small business selling school materials on a retail basis. She has been running her business for over nine years. She has also been a teacher and so she knows the advantages of this type of business. With the return to school approaching she wants to increase her income. She is requesting her fourth loan from WAGES in order to purchase various school supplies. She is married and the mother of two children.

loans.use: To purchase various school materials.

loans.name: Margarita Magdalena

texts.es:
Margarita es una mujer de 27 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con su pequeño hijo,ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Margarita no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Margarita trabaja como empleada del hogar brindando servicios de limpieza, cocina y cuidados del hogar, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación.
Margarita se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará una cocina, la cual reemplazara a su cocina de kerosene que presenta desperfectos, así pues Margarita seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de convertirse en una profesional.
texts.en:
Margarita is 27 years old and lives with her young son in the city of Ica, within the Parcona district.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman who dedicates all of her efforts to getting ahead.  Unfortunately she was not able to seek a professional career because she had to go to work due to lack of resources.

Margarita works as a private employee cleaning, cooking, and caring for the household.  She works about 10 hours a day and believes that things are going well for her because of her dedication.

Margarita is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to them, she will be able to buy a stove, which will replace the kerosene one that presents challenges.  Margarita will continue to work and make an effort to achieve her greatest dream of becoming a professional.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Adjowa

texts.fr: Adjowa est une femme mariée de 48 ans et mère de 3 enfants dont 02 sont scolarisés). Son conjoint exerce la profession de chauffeur tandis qu’elle pratique le commerce. Elle achète et revend du maïs et du riz. Elle est très souvent confrontée au problème de fluctuation de prix des produits sur le marché. Adjowa fait partie de l’aimable clientèle de WAGES et elle sollicite un second crédit dans le but de réaliser de l’approvisionnement en marchandises. Elle espère que ce crédit permettra l’éclosion de son activité et l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en: Adjowa is a married woman, 48 years old, and the mother of three children, of whom two are in school. Her husband is a chauffeur by trade, while she works in commerce. She buys and sells corn and rice. She is very often confronted with the problem of product price fluctuations on the market. Adjowa is a nice client at WAGES, and she is requesting a second loan with the goal of stocking up on merchandise. She hopes that this loan will enable her to business to bloom and her family to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of corn and rice to sell.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрату 44 года. Он женат и имеет 2 детей. Его жена работает в государственной организации. Его старший сын Шухрат, ему 21 года. Его младший сын Амридин, ему 18 лет. Шухрат имеет среднее специальное образование. Он уже много лет работает шофёром. Родители Шухрата живут вместе с его семьёй. Шухрат является основным кормильцем семьи. Он старается дать высшее образование своим детям. Его младший сын Амридин успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в университет. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор и с такой целью он обратился за займом в сумме 650 долларов США. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shuhrat is 44 years old and he is married with two children.  His wife works for a governmental organization.  His elder son, Shuhrat, is 21 years old and his younger son, Amridin, is 18 years old.  Shuhrat has a high school education and he has been working as a driver for many years.  His parents live together with him and his family, and Shuhrat is the main breadwinner for the family.  He wants to give his children an education.  His younger son, Amridin, successfully finished high school and earned a place at university.  Shuhrat needs to pay for the tuition and with that goal in mind, he asked for a loan of $650.  He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his son's university education

loans.name: Sabrina

texts.ru: Сабрине 22 года. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. После окончания средней школы она поступила 3 месячный курс по обучения компьютерного навыка. Она работает в финансовом отделе управления района. Она умная женщина и всегда старается к новшеству. Она хочет усовершенствовать свои знания и получить высшее образование. Она в этом году поступила в университет. Сабрина должна оплатить за учебный договор и поэтому она запрашивает займ. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Sabrina is 22 years and she is married, but does not have children.  After the finished high school, she enrolled in a three-month course in computer skills.  Sabrina works in the financial department of her regional council.  She is a smart woman and always tries to be innovative.  She wants to firm up her knowledge and receive a higher education.  Sabrina earned a place at university this year and she needs to pay for the tuition, which is why she has asked for a loan.  She is awaiting your kindness and counting on your charity.

loans.use: to pay for her university education

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en: Clarita plans to improve her small variety store to supplement her husband's income. She is 50 years old and has three children. Her plan to improve her sales will help her give her family a better quality of life and provide her children with formal education. Due to financial constraints, Clarita is asking for a loan to buy assorted biscuits, canned goods, candies, noodles, soft drinks, beverages, and seasonings to sell. She will be more patient and hard-working to achieve better sales and a prosperous living in the future.

loans.use: to buy assorted biscuits, canned goods, candies, noodles, soft drinks, beverages and seasonings to sell

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en: Lucila lives in San Carlos, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur with her three children. To make a living, she operates a tailoring business in their community. She joined Gata Daku MPC in 2008. She successfully repaid her previous loan, which she used to purchase fabrics and sewing materials. Recently, she borrowed a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair her sewing machine and to renovate her shop for better and convenient service. She wants to improve the general living conditions of her family in the future.

loans.use: to repair her sewing machine and to renovate her shop

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional fishing materials for her fishing business.

Amelia has been in this business for two years. She earns additional income from raising pigs.

Amelia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money in the future to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing materials.

loans.name: Alona

texts.en:
Alona, a hardworking entrepreneur who has operated a general store business in the Philippines for two years, earns additional income from fishing. She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more items to sell including canned goods, soy sauce, sugar, soap, shampoo, snack foods and other groceries.


Alona has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, soy sauce, sugar, soap, shampoo, snack foods and other groceries

loans.name: Muhabat

texts.ru: Мухабату 47 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она имеет высшее образование, так как она окончила Худжандский Государственный Университет факультет Русской филологии. Мухабат данное время работает в учебном центре и является преподавательницей. Ее муж имеет свой бизнес. Он является таксистом. Мухабат и ее муж стараются создать все условия для образования своих детей. Ее дети учатся в Турецкой школе. Мухабат должна оплатить за учебу детей в школе. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы своих детей. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Muhabat is 47 and married with three children. She has a degree in Russian philology from Khujand State University and currently works as a teacher in an education centre. Her husband has his own business as a taxi driver. Muhabat and her husband are trying to prepare for the further education of their children, who study in a Turkish school. She has to pay for the children's schooling and is requesting a loan for their tuition. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To pay for her children's education costs

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 30 years old and married to Gladys. They have been blessed with four children, aged 12, 10, 8, and 6 years. David is in the transport business commonly referred to as 'boda-boda' in Kenya and also has a pool table. David has operated this business for over 10 years with a monthly income of KES 20,000.

David is borrowing a loan of KES 100,000 which he plans to use to expand his pool table business as well as offer maintenance services on his motorcycle. This is his third loan after successfully repaying his previous loans.
His hope is to raise his family with a sustainable source of income.

loans.use: To purchase a new pool table and service his motorbike.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
This is Aida. She previously accessed a PHP 50,000 loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household, and business expenditures. For additional income, she also has a food stall.

Aida would like to apply for another PHP 50,000 loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell should result in greater profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Aida hopes for a continuous business expansion and dreams to give her family a good life. Every week, she meets with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from her studies of the Word of God.

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 45 years old, widowed, and the mother of two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Susan has a food stall in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more food to sell in her food stall.

Susan has been in this business for ten years. In the future, She would like to save enough to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more food to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Nasimkhon

texts.ru:
Насимхон из Явана добрый человек с открытой душой и опытный дехканин. Ему 43 года. Он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур вот уже 10 лет. Он из тех трудолюбивых людей, которые никогда не боятся трудностей и продвигаются вперед и делают все ради семьи и благо общества. Его спутница-жена во все ему помогает и далее поддерживает мужа в дальнейшем расширить свою деятельность. Насимхон является отцом шестерых детей. У него трое сыновей, которым по 7, 10, 14 лет и трое дочерей, которым по 16, 11 и 4 года. Все его дети, кроме младшей дочери ходят в школу.  
Насимхон просит кредит для повторного посева. Он хочет приобрести семена кукурузы, богарного арбуза, топливо, а перед посевом обработать землю.
texts.en: Nasimkhon from Yavan is a good man with an open mind and he is an experienced farmer.  He is 43 years old and he has been involved in agricultural work for 10 years already.  He is a hard-working person who never shies away from a challenge and moves forward, doing everything for the happiness of his family and for the good of society.  His wife/companion helps him and gives him further support to expand his activities.  Nasimkhon is the father of six children.  He has three sons, who are 7, 10 and 14, and three daughters, who are 16, 11 and 4.  All of his children, except his youngest daughter, are in school.  Nasimkhon is asking for a loan to make a second sowing of seeds.  He wants to buy corn and watermelon seeds, as well as gas, and to work the land before the sewing.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and watermelon, gas and to cultivate the land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her son's tuition and other school-related expenses.

loans.name: Jeninah

texts.en: Jeninah is a single mother, separated from her husband. Jeninah has children who go to school. She strives hard to generate income from her grocery business in order to pay school fees. However, she has a challenge of inadequate capital. She would like to get 500,000 UGX to buy more sweet bananas. When she buys in bulk, she buys cheaply and therefore make more profit after sales. She is hard-working and resilient. She thanks Ugafode for giving her loans, despite her lack of security. She pledges to pay well to grow the partnership.

loans.use: To buy sweet bananas from farmers to sell

loans.name: Taporu

texts.en:
Taporu is 42 years old and married, supporting a family of three members. Taporu has been in this business for the past three years, with a monthly income of KES 15,000.

He managed to get a third loan from KADET LTD of KES 50,000, which he used to purchase fertilizers,pesticides as well as cattle. The anticipated profit will use to expand his wife's (who is called Kadat) business.

His hope is to see his wife Kadat and children living a comfortable life as he becomes more stable financially.

loans.use: to expand his farming business by buying animals and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Doña María de 56 años de edad reside en casa propia con su familia, es una persona muy trabajadora,  responsable y honesta posee un negocio de venta de  tamales y pupusas, ya son varios los años de tener el negocio, por su amabilidad y buenos precios ha sabido ganarse su clientela, ahora ella solicita un crédito para  invertirlo en la compra de productos como:  maíz, frijol,  quesillo,  chicharrón, etc. y así aumentar  sus ventas y sus ganancias  en su negocio  y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María, who is 56 years old, lives at home with her family. She is a very hardworking, responsible, and honest person.

She owns a business where she sells tamales and pupusas (handmade corn tortillas stuffed with various fillings). She has had the business for many years. Her friendliness and good prices have attracted many customers.

She requests this loan to invest in the purchase of products like corn, beans, fresh cheese, fried pork rinds, etc. and, in this way, to increase her sales and earnings from her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, fresh cheese, fried pork rinds, etc.

loans.name: Caterine Patricia

texts.es:
Ella es una mujer que estudia contabilidad financiera, entro al tercer piso en edad, madre consagrada y luchadora que quiere mejorar y cambiar sus oportunidades laborales, siempre trabajó en ventas y sabe que es buena en eso y que además le va muy bien, pero lo que realmente la llevó a cambiar sus expectativas laborales es el querer tener un trabajo donde pueda escalar y poder ser mejor de lo que ya es.
Realmente  ella quiere manejar una estabilidad laboral, salarial y un proyecto de vida mejor, más promisorio y con las oportunidades que la vida pueda ofrecerle a ella y a su familia. Sin duda alguna ve en sus objetivos a corto plazo laborar en una excelente empresa con un cargo bien remunerado y estable, en busca de alcanzar sus objetivos a mediano y largo plazo, comprar una vivienda propia y ahorrar para el futuro de su pequeña hija, tal vez para muchos son planes corrientes y de poca relevancia pero para ella es forjar su futuro al lado de su familia.
Con sacrificio y entrega, ella esta a punto culminar sus estudios y sabe que este es uno de los tantos peldaños que deberá escalar para llegar a cumplir sus sueños y expectativas. Sabe que esta es una oportunidad que no debe dejar pasar, sabe lo que desea y necesita.
Ella sabe que no puede dar mas largas a sus sueños y expectativas ya que como todos sabemos el tiempo no da espera y con su pasar se van las oportunidades, por lo que ella piensa que es el momento indicado para lograr la estabilidad que desea alcanzar y que sin duda alguna éste es el momento de poner a andar su proyecto de vida.   
Esta mujer espera que su solicitud de apoyo sea escuchada y de antemano agradece su aporte.  Su compromiso es dar todo de su parte para lograr sus sueños, siempre a creído que todo aquello que se consigue con sacrificio, amor y esperanza da como resultado una cosecha de bienestar moral y por qué no decirlo económico. 
Sin duda alguna esta mujer quiere aprender de la vida y salir avante de las batallas y contratiempos que se presenten, lo único que necesita son las herramientas para empezar su batalla.
texts.en:
This woman, who is in her 30’s, is studying Financial Accounting. She is a devoted and determined mother who wants to improve and change her work opportunities. She has always worked in sales and is very knowledgeable and successful at what she does, but she is looking to change her job prospects so that she can pursue a career in which she can advance and achieve a better position than where she currently is. What she really wants is a stable job, a better salary, and a path to a better life with more promising opportunities offered to her and her family. Without a doubt, some of her short-term goals include working for an excellent company, being compensated well, and experiencing stability. Included in her medium and long term goals are her desire to buy a house of her own and to save for her young daughter’s future. Her current plans have little importance when compared to shaping the future for herself and her family.

With sacrifice and dedication, the borrower is at a point where she is about to complete her studies. She knows that this is one of many steps that she must take in order to fulfill her dreams and goals. This is an opportunity that must not be missed, so she knows that she needs to make use of it. The borrower knows that she cannot give up on her greatest dreams and wishes since time waits for no one and opportunities can easily pass. She believes that now is the right time to proceed forward with her path in life.

This woman hopes that her request for support is heard, so she expresses her appreciation in advance. She promises to give everything she can to fulfill her dreams since she has always believed that nothing is achieved without sacrifice, love, and hope. These traits stem from one’s moral well-being and not from financial standing. Without a doubt, this woman wants to learn in life and press forward past any struggles and setbacks that may occur. The only things she needs are the tools that will help her persevere through the struggle.

loans.use: to pay for her coursework in Financial Accounting.

loans.name: Erasmo

texts.es:
Don Erasmo de 62 años de edad, esta casado, la esposa se dedica a realizar los oficios del hogar mientras él se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, tiene dos hijos pero ya no viven con él ya formaron sus familias. Don Erasmo, en la casa solo vive junto a su esposa y un sobrino ya que ellos lo tienen a su cargo, porque sus padres están en otro país. 

Sus cultivos son de maíz, frijol y hortalizas, trabaja por la mañana en lo ajeno y en las tardes trabaja lo propio de él; aprendió este oficio de su padre quien desde que era un niño le comenzó a ir inculcando el trabajo del campo para que cuando creciera pudiera desempeñarlo de una excelente manera y tener una fuente de ingresos con la cual podría hacerle frente a los compromisos familiares así como crediticios.  El lugar donde trabaja esta ubicado a 50 minutos a pie de su casa así que tiene que madrugar todos los días para salir con todos los trabajos que se propone realizar.

Con el crédito  comprara abonos y herbicidas para sus cultivos ya que hay plagas que han llegado a los cultivos vecinos y  no quiere que se le dañe la cosecha, también el pagara mano de obra a las personas que le apoyen a cultivar la tierra; ya que sembrara 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz, 3,500 de frijol y 3,500 de hortalizas entre la variedad están: Tomate, ejote, chile, pepino; su idea es mejora con la venta de estos productos así como también será un poco mas bajo el costo de compra y su traslado.
 
En un futuro, desea cultivar mas tierra y disponer de un mayor margen de ganancias con la venta de los productos, desea que sus esfuerzos sean satisfactorios y que la cosecha sea abundante, que sus nietos puedan aprender estos oficios que realiza, ya que estos les puede generar un ingresos cuando ellas formen su propia familia.
texts.en:
Erasmo is 62 years old and  married. His wife is a housewife, he is a farmer. They have two children who no longer live with them as they now have their own families. Erasmo lives with his wife and a nephew who they take care of, as his parents are out of the country. He grows corn, beans and vegetables. In the morning he works in other people's fields and in the afternoon he takes care of his own. He learned his trade from his father, who since he was young taught him about working the land so that when he grew up, he could do this well. This would give him a source of income to pay off his family obligations and credits. The place where he works is 50 minutes walk from his house so he has to get up very early in the morning to accomplish everything he should do.

Erasmo will use the loan to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his crops, as neighboring crops have been invaded by infestations. He doesn't want his crops damaged. Also he will pay people to help him work on his crops as he plants 10,500 square meters of corn, 3,500 of corn and 3,500 of vegetables such as tomatoes, green beans, chilies, and cucumbers.

Erasmo's idea is to increase the amount of products he sells as well as reduce the cost of producing them and the transportation costs. In the future he would like to farm more land and receive a higher margin of profit from his products. He would like to see that his efforts are rewarded, his harvests abundant and that his grandchildren learn his trade. This can provide them a way to earn their living when they have their own families.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and pay workers to help grow his corn, bean and vegetable crops.

loans.name: Jorge Humberto

texts.es:
Tal vez muchas personas se preguntan, ¿porqué un hombre quiere estudiar cosmetología y estética? Bien, JORGE siempre tuvo esa pregunta en su mente tratando de dar una respuesta a esa gran incógnita que muchas personas no entiendan. Ahora bien, cuando analizo y encontró esa respuesta sintió paz en su interior para poderla empezar a desarrollar, quieren saber ¿cuál fue la respuesta que el encontró?, fácil, estudiar ESTETICA, ayuda a ayudar a otras personas que desean estar a la vanguardia que el mundo nos ofrece en el día a día y porque no, desarrollar esta profesión en pos de un negocio lucrativo y novedoso.
Jorge es un joven técnico en Sistemas que labora en el área social dentro de una Iglesia y ha podido ver la necesidad del hombre en diferentes ámbitos, es allí cuando ha podido entablar una entrevista con mujeres y hombres que desean superarse siempre ve ciertos limitantes, ya que la belleza y estética en nuestro país son temas que van de la mano con el desarrollo profesional, lastimosamente no debería ser así, pero es la realidad que se está viviendo.
Jorge en el año 2011 inicia la búsqueda junto con un grupo de compañeros de su misma actividad laboral, como crear  maneras diversas de ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan, allí se les ocurrió la idea de iniciar estudios en el área de la psicología y se encontró con un mundo de dimensiones que rige al hombre, ejemplo SALUD-BIENESTAR-FELICIDAD. Poco a poco fue conociendo personas que lo empezaron a impulsar a estudiar no sólo psicología sino una carrera que tuviera fines en el campo de la salud y la belleza.
Ahora bien, cuando Jorge piensa en la actividad de la estética no solo piensa en el embellecer sino por medio del internet se dio cuenta que por medio de los equipos eléctricos de la estética puede tratar inclusive pacientes en estado “vegetal” dándoles así bienestar y manejo de los músculos para evitar escaras y/o ulceras, es decir no solo se une belleza y arte sino también salud a esta profesión, porque no ingresar a un mercado laboral o crear una empresa que sea en pro de la belleza y salud integral.
Bien ahora viendo la cantidad de oferta académica Jorge elije estudiar esta carrera en CAMPO ALTO, por su desempeño académico y la experiencia que tiene a nivel formal en el área técnicos en salud, solo resta desearle tanto a Jorge, sus futuros compañeros y a CAMPO ALTO, bendiciones espirituales, celestiales y materiales.
texts.en:
Perhaps a lot of people are wondering, why does a guy want to study cosmetology and beauty? Well, Jorge always had this question in his mind, trying to find an answer to this great mystery that many people don't understand. Now, after analyzing the question and finding his answer, he felt peace inside and is able to begin to grow. People want to know what was the answer that he found - easy, to study beauty, to help other people who want to be on the cutting edge of what the world offers day to day, and to develop this profession into a lucrative and novel business. 

Jorge is a young systems technician who works in social activities at a church and has been able to see men's needs in different areas. It's there where he began to interview women and men who want to better themselves, but always seeing certain limitations since beauty and aesthetics in his country are topics that go hand in hand with professional development; it shouldn't be this way, but that is the reality in which he lives. 

In 2011 Jorge began the search, together with a group of friends from work, for how to create diverse ways to help people in need. Through this he got the idea to begin studying psychology and discovered a world of dimensions that control men, such as health, wellbeing, happiness. Little by little he got to know people who began to urge him to study not psychology, but a career that was part of the health and beauty field. 

Now when Jorge thinks about aesthetics he doesn't just think about beautification, but through the internet he realized that with electric technology aesthetics can treat even patients with brain damage, improving their wellbeing and maintaining their muscles to avoid bedsores and/or ulcers. That is to say that it is not just beauty and art that are connected, but health is also a part of the profession, so why not become part of a labor market or create a business in beauty and integrative health. 

Having seen the quantity of academic options, Jorge chose to study this career in Campo Alto. Thanks to his academic dedication and experience in technical aspects of health, all that remains is to wish for Jorge, his future colleagues and Campo Alto, spiritual, celestial and material blessings.

loans.use: to attend his first semester of cosmetology and holistic beauty school in Campoalto.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en: Macaria raises pigs for a living. She patiently takes care of her pigs in her village for three to four months before she sells them. She earns an average of 2,000 PHP net income for each pig. To supplement her livestock feed, she is requesting a loan. This will greatly help her maintain the business. She wisely uses the income generated from the business for her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: To supplement her livestock feed

loans.name: Keivin Andres

texts.es: Keivin Andres es un joven que actualmente tiene 20 años. En su época estudiantil siempre estuvo entre los mejores estudiantes de su colegio al poco tiempo, por fuerza mayor le toco prestar el servicio militar desde que salio del servicio militar no se ha podido ubicar laboralmente, en este momento se encuentra sin trabajo y el quiere estudiar en Campoalto con el fin de realizar un programa tecnico y poderse ubicar laboralmente, ya que tampoco cuenta con medios para realizarlo, pues su familia no cuenta con buena estabilidad economica, pero el esta seguro que con esta oportunidad podra mejorar economicamente y quiere tener la ayuda de ustedes para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Kevin Andrés is a young man who is 20-years-old.  He was always among the best students throughout his secondary education phase.  Due to factors beyond him, shortly after he had to do his military service and since he completed it has been unable to find work.  He’s currently unemployed and he wants to study in Campoalto in order to complete a technical program and be able to secure employment.  Since he also lacks the means to do so because his family does not have good economic stability, he’s sure that with this opportunity he’ll be able to improve economically and he’d like your help in order to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to start first semester of Hotel and Hospitality.

loans.name: Milena  Patricia

texts.es: Milena patricia es una joven de 26 años  que acaba de iniciar estudios  en auxiliar en servicios farmacéuticos. Siempre su sueño fue estudiar  algo relacionado  con la salud  pero hasta el momento  no había tenido los recursos  económicos para hacerlo, sus metas a corto plazo  son finalizar sus estudios  para poder conseguir un buen empleo en una buena  droguería, para cada día aprender un poco más y en un  futuro   poder montar su propia droguería y atenderla ella misma y así seguir  adelante y colaborarle a su familia.
texts.en:
Milena Patricia is a 26 year old young woman who just began her studies to aid in pharmaceutical services. Her dream has always been to study something health-related, but until now, she has not had the economic resources to do it.

Her short-term goal is to finish her studies to be able to find a good job in a good drug store, so that she can learn more each day and in the future, be able to start her own drug store and staff it herself, in this way getting ahead and assisting her family.

loans.use: to study at Campoalto.

loans.name: Yesica Marcela

texts.es:
Yesica era una niña que desde muy pequeña soñaba con ayudar a las personas que más lo necesitaran, falta. Fue creciendo siempre con esta meta, pensando en crear fundaciones para habitantes de calle o ancianos que por algún motivo tendrían que sufrir la vida de la calle. Nunca dejo a un lado el ayudar y darle una mejor estabilidad a su familia, en especial a su madre quien había luchado mucho por salir adelante.

En el estudio siempre se destacó por ser una excelente estudiante, tanto a nivel académico como convivencial. Su etapa del colegio no fue fácil, pues estudiaba en la mañana y en la tarde, no tenía tiempos libres, ya que estos eran para ayudarle a su madre con quehaceres del hogar y también a su hermano con sus tareas y a su cuidado. Por todos estos motivos habían noches en que ella solo podía dormir hasta dos horas, era un gran esfuerzo pues se estaba deteriorando física y mentalmente, pero sabia que todo este esmero tendría su pronta recompensa; su graduación.

Empezó a estudiar enfermería, era una manera de que sus sueños se empezaran a hacer realidad, con esta profesión salvaría vidas y ayudaría a mucha gente, además sueña también con estudiar psicología.
texts.en:
Ever since Yesica was a child she dreamed of helping those people who are most in need. She grew up with this aim in mind, thinking about creating foundations for homeless people or for the elderly who for whatever reason had to live on the streets. She never stopped helping her family and giving them more stability, particularly her mother who fought hard to get ahead.

In her studies she always stood out as an excellent student, at an academic level as well as socially. Her time at school was not easy because she studied during the morning and the afternoon and used her free time to help her family with the household chores and to help her brother with his homework and looked after him. For all these reasons there were nights when she only slept for two hours, it was a huge effort because it wore her out physically and mentally, but she knew that all her efforts would be rewarded: with her graduation.

She began studying nursing, it was a way of making her dreams reality: in this profession she would save lives and help many people. She also hopes to study psychology.

loans.use: to study nursing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials to build a greenhouse, to purchase sea buckthorn seedlings, and to fix his car

loans.name: Djebeleton  4 Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  DJEBELETON 4 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 46 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à TAMARO, un des villages de la commune de DAH cercle de SAN de la  4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 3eme prêt avec l’institution, le prêt passé à été bien remboursé.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide  avec SANATA, 3e femme debout  de la gauche vers la droite en complet vert  sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et au marché de SAN, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 150 000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Djebeleton 4 group are married women. On average, they are 46 years old and have four children. They all live in traditional families in Tamaro, one of the villages in Dah in the San cercle (in the 4th administrative region of Mali). 

They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution in order to maintain their farming activities over the rainy season. This is their third loan with the institution and the previous loan was repaid in full.

Sanata, pictured in a green outfit standing third from the left, grows groundnuts. She will use her loan to buy farm inputs, seed and minor agricultural equipment, as well as pay the labour costs to maintain 1.5 hectares. 

After harvest, the produce is sold in the village and in the market at San, to both men and women customers. Sanata is hoping to make 150 000 CFA francs by the end of the campaign. This money will help her to pay off the loan and help her husband with day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay labour costs, and purchase farm inputs, minor agricultural equipment and seed.

loans.name: Ankadignogoye Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe ANKADIGNOGOYE  ont en moyenne 53 ans, 6 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à KIMPARANA  un des villages du cercles de SAN de la quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali.
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente de graines de céréales, de la restauration  et la vente de produits divers.
Elles sont à leur 9eme  prêt solidaire. FANTA 1 ère femme débout de la gauche  vers la droite, compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter,  2 bidons de vingt litres d’huile, un sac d’oignon, 2 boites de concentrée de tomate, 5 kilo de l’ail, 100kg de riz et 3 cartons de macaroni pour des fins de restauration.
 Elles s’approvisionnent à Koutiala et dans les villages environnants. Elle effectue ses ventes, sur place à KIMPARANA  à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes.
Elles envisagent réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 80 500FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  à la nourriture,  aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women in the Ankadignogoye group are 53 years old on average, and have an average of six children. They all live in traditional extended families in Kimparana, one of the villages in the San cercle (in the 4th administrative region of Mali).

The women are all related and their business activities include trading cereals, catering and selling various other products.

This is their ninth solidarity loan. Fanta, picture standing on the far left, is intending to use her loan to buy two 20-liter cans of oil, a sack of onions, two boxes of tomato concentrate, five kilos of garlic, 100 kilos of rice and three boxes of macaroni to use in her catering business.

The women buy their supplies in Koutiala and the surrounding villages. Fanta sells her goods locally in Kimparana to both men and women customers.

The women are hoping to make a monthly average of 80 500 CFA francs, which will be spent on healthcare, food, school fees and reinvesting in their businesses.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her catering business.

loans.name: Al-Aziz

texts.en:
Al-Aziz has been Nazava’s reseller in Bogor, West Java, Indonesia since 2011. He has sold hundreds of water filters and also established a network of resellers in several cities in Indonesia. Bogor is a large city just north of Indonesia’s Capital Jakarta. Bogor has all the problems third world cities have: including a lack of access to safe and affordable drinking.
