The member whose photo is inserted in the bottom right of the group photo had their picture taken after the meeting. The member asked for permission because of work. 

The other members have various businesses such a grocery store, a taxi service, selling food, and selling moraya [also known as tunta or chuño. It is dehydrated potatoes prepared using an ancient indigenous Peruvian method]. 

Elena is thankful to those who have become a part of her dream through this means. She commits to making her loan payments within the stipulated time period.

loans.use: purchase ingredients for cooking such as rice, chicken, beef, and vegetables

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert is a 24-year-old, married man with three children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda.

He operates a poultry business, but also practices crop production which has facilitated him in meeting his family's expenses. The high cost of feed hinders his business growth, while his dream is to start making feed from maize husks and to build a permanent house.

Gilbert intends to use the loan to buy poultry feed.

loans.use: to buy poultry feed.

loans.name: Gorretti

texts.en: Gorretti is a 40-year-old married woman with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has been running a drug shop but also has a motorcycle transport business. With the proceeds she has been able to pay school fees for her child and renovate her house despite limited capital. Her goal is to have a well-stocked pharmacy and also set up a clinic. Gorretti intends to use the loan to buy medicinal drugs to sell.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical drugs to sell.

loans.name: Ainea

texts.en:
Ainea is 33 years old and comes from Naivasha; married to Kwamini, they have three children who are in school.

He  is in the transport business in Naivasha, a business  which he has operated  for four  years. He has applied for his first  loan from Kadet Ltd to enable him to service his motorbike. With anticipated profit, he plans to pay school fees.

He hopes to be financially stable in the near future.

loans.use: To service the motorbike.

loans.name: Zipporah

texts.en:
Zipporah is 35 years old and comes from Ndunyu Njeru, is married to Justus, and they have two children aged eleven and six years old.

She has a boutique which she has operated for one year and has applied for her first loan from Kadet Ltd to enable her to buy clothes for resale. She plans to buy more stock of clothes with the anticipated profit.

In the near future, Zipporah hopes to become the leading clothes dealer in Ndunyu Njeru.

loans.use: To buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Cesar Manuel

texts.es: Cesar, tiene 30 años de edad, es soltero, y vive en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida junto a su madre. El es una persona emprendedora, desde hace mas 4 años se dedica a vender chicharrones de soya en bolsitas en ristras, y sorpresas (confites con un juguetito para niños). Distribuye sus productos de manera ambulante transportándose en motocicleta. ha invertido varios prestamos, actualmente solicita otro por 11,000 Lempiras, que lo utilizara para seguir surtiendo de materia prima como: chicharrones, especies, condimentos, juguetes, y otros insumos para preparar ristras de producto y vender y con una parte va reparar la motocicleta. Su meta es seguir creciendo con el negocio para tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Cesar, 30, is single. He lives with his mother in the municipality of Tela, Atlántida. He is an enterprising person. He has been selling soy chicharrones [a vegetarian version of fried pork rinds] in plastic bags and “mystery prizes” (sweets that contain a toy, for children) for more than four years. He works as a street vendor, riding a motorcycle. He has received several loans, and is now requesting another one of 11,000 lempiras [HNL]. He will buy more supplies, such as chicharrones, spices, condiments and toys, in order to have more products to sell. He will also repair his motorcycle. His goal is to continue expanding his business in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as chicharrones [imitation pork rinds], spices, condiments and toys and to repair his motorcycle.

loans.name: Ann Maa Beleswari Self Help Group

texts.en:
Ann Maa Beleswari Self Help Group has 10 members who are all from the same neighbourhood. The lady sitting second from the right hand side, wearing a blue saree in the photo, is Kuni, the leader of the group. 

Kuni is a 41-year-old married woman from Balipatna village of Odisha, India. The couple has two children who are schooling. Kuni lives with her children and, together with her husband, takes care of all the household expenses. For the past five years she has been involved in the activity of growing and selling vegetables; her husband helps her in this activity. All the members of this group are engaged other different kinds of activities like agriculture, cattle farming, etc. In order to strengthen the business and respond to customer demand, Kuni, together with her group Ann Maa Beleswari Self Help Group, has requested a loan amount of 100,000 INR for purchasing vegetable plants, seeds, fertilizers and pesticides. Their goal is to expand their business activities.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing seeds, vegetable plants, fertilizers and pesticides for vegetable farming.

loans.name: Benkadi 3 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  Benkadi 3 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 45 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à DJIGONSSO commune de BOUGOURA  cercle  de BLA, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 4eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est l’arachide avec   MINATA 1 ere femme  debout de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1,5 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à San et YANGASSO, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 140.000FCFA en fin de campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group Benkadi 3 are married women who average 45 years of age and 4 children each, and who all live in traditional families in DJIGONSSO, in the commune of BOUGOURA, circle of BLA (4th administrative region of Mali). 

They joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to sustain their farming activities during the rainy season. This is their 4th collaboration with the MFI. All past loans were correctly repaid.  

Minata grows groundnuts. She is the group member standing first from the left in the photo. She will use her loan to buy inputs, seeds and small farming equipment, and to pay for the plowing needed to maintain 1.5 hectares of farmland. 

After the harvest, the crops will be sold in the village and in San and Yangasso to a clientele consisting of both men and women. She expects to earn a profit of 140,000 FCFA by the end of the season, which she will use to repay her loan and to help her husband with day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy inputs, seeds, and small farming equipment, and to cover the cost of plowing,

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta estudia en la universidad y vive en casa propia con su familia, es una persona amable, responsable y trabajadora, tiene un puesto de comida desde hace un año, es una persona emprendedora,  con lo que gana en su negocio ayuda a su familia en los gastos del hogar también paga sus gastos personales como la universidad, la clienta esta solicitando  un crédito  para poder  invertirlo  en lo  que es la compra de: pollos, carne, arroz, maíz frijol, frutas, verduras,  etc. y con esto  poder establecer mejores ingresos  y tener una  mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
This client is attending university and lives in her own home with her family. She is a kind, responsible, and hard-working person. She is very entrepreneural and has had a food stand for a year. With what she earns in her business she helps her family with houshold expenses and also pays her personal expenses, such as university costs. 

This client is applying for a loan in order to buy chicken, meat, rice, corn, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc. and with this be able to increase her profits and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, rice, corn, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Plan Director - Cusco Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece  al banco comunal PLAN DIRECTOR - CUSCO; este banco está situado en el distrito de  Wanchaq en la provincia  de Cusco departamento de Cusco.

La socia Rosa Isabel, la socia tiene 45 años de edad ,03 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes, colonias entre otros, la socia lleva años dedicándose a esta actividad el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia tambien alquila cuartos en su casa a estudiantes o personas que soliciten, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esa forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar colonias para damas.

Los otros socios se dedican a trabajar en una pastelería, administrar un grifo y los demás trabajan en instituciones públicas.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.

Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta, son socios que  pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Plan Director – Cusco. This bank is located in the district of Wanchaq in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

Rosa Isabel is a member and is a 45-year-old single mother of three children. She alternates her daily activities with her business in selling beauty products such as creams, perfumes, colognes, etc. She has been selling these products for years, and it's going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into her business every day. She also rents out rooms in her house to students or others who might need one. She would like to be able to continue working this way in order to continue supporting her family. She is applying for the loan in order to buy women's perfume.

The other members work in a bakery, run a gas station, or work in public institutions.

The person whose face is covered does not belong to the communal bank. The members whose photo has been attached to the group photo were given permission to arrive late to the meeting due to work reasons.

Rosa Isabel is grateful for this medium through which loans are facilitated, and is committed to completing her payments.

loans.use: to buy women's perfume.

loans.name: Nzoki

texts.en:
Nzoki is a 41-year-old tailor and is married to Mutemi, who provides additional income. They are blessed with 11 children. 

Nzoki has been in the tailoring industry for the past eight years and earns a monthly income of 5000 KES, which she uses to support her family. Nzoki is applying for her first loan with KADET. She will use the loan to buy more tailoring materials.

With the expected profit from the business, she will settle her loan and pay school fees for her children. 

Her hopes and dreams are to give her children a quality education.

loans.use: to buy more tailoring materials.

loans.name: Eliud

texts.en:
Eliud is a 68-year-old businessman and is married to Lydia, a housewife. They are blessed with nine children who fully depend on them. 

Eliud has been running his hotel for the past five years with a monthly income of 10,000 KES, which he uses to support his family. 

Eliud is applying for his fourth loan with KADET. He will use the loan to buy cartons of milk, bales of wheat flour and cooking oil for resale. With the expected profit from the business, he will expand his hotel for better profit. 

His hope and dream is to buy a piece of land and build a home of his own.

loans.use: To buy cartons of milk, bales of wheat flour and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a married, 40-year-old mother of three in Thika.  Alice has been running a grocery store for the past six years with a monthly income of KES 10,500, which she uses to support her family. Alice is applying for her third loan from KADET LTD after repaying her previous loans successfully. 

She will use the loan to purchase potatoes, kale, tomatoes, cabbage and carrots. She will use the additional income to reinvest in her business and improve the standard of living of her family. 

She hopes to educate her children to college level and secure their future.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes, kale, tomatoes, cabbage and carrots

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David, a 53-year-old, married father of two, from Thika, has a business as a mixed crop farmer. He earns a monthly income of KES 7,000 which he uses to support his family. 

This marks his third loan term with Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET), after successfully repaying his previous loans. 

With the loan he has applied for from KADET, he will be able to purchase more seedlings, fertilizer, one-day-old chicks, and animal feed. Additional income created will allow him to cater to his family’s needs and to repay his loan. 

In the future, David would like purchase a piece of land and construct a permanent, residential house. He hopes to have a comfortable life, together with his family.

loans.use: to purchase more seedlings, fertilizer, one-day-old chicks, and animal feed.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es: Doña Aracely  de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia junto  a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 3 y 11 años de edad, Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace 10 años, es una persona trabajadora, con principios y valores cristianos, es muy responsable y honesta, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, posee una gran demanda por sus cultivos, gracias a su trabajo ha llegado solventar algunos de sus gastos. Aracely solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas,  y abonos, de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos y  mejorar su calidad de  vida.
texts.en:
Aracely is 33 years old. She lives in her own house together with her husband and two children, aged 3 and 11 years old. She has grown corn and beans for the last ten years. She is a hard-working person with Christian values and principals, very honest and responsible. She sells her product in the local area. There is great demand for her harvest and thanks to her effort she is able to pay some of the household expenses. 

Aracely is asking for this loan to buy agricultural supplies like seeds, fertilizer, herbicide and manure in order to increase her income and enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicides and manure.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a 35-year-old married man with two children living in Fort, Uganda. His main business is cutting peoples' compounds and he also has a motorcycle transport business. He faces challenges of unpredictable weather changes and high cost of fuel for the machine while his vision is to buy a taxi and build a permanent residential house. Julius intends to use the loan to buy iron sheets to roof his house.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets to roof his house.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam has been engaged in agriculture for many years. She lives with her brother and parents in Byuravan village, Ararat region.
Despite her young age, Mariam is very skilled in farming activities. Her farm currently includes a cow and three calves. Mariam's family also owns a small farm where they grow different types of fruit trees (peach, apricot, apple, and pear).
Mariam's brother sells the gathered harvest in the local market and gathers income for the family.
Realizing that agricultural income is very important for family's well being, Mariam has requested this loan.
With the loan's help she would like to purchase fertilizer and fuel for transporting the gathered harvest to the market.
Mariam feels very responsible to take care of her family and ensure better life for them.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and fuel for transporting the gathered harvest to the market

loans.name: Pidson

texts.en:
Pidson is a 33-year-old married man with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He operates a metal fabrication workshop and he was inspired to go into business by the desire to be self-employed. Customers' delaying paying on time and the high cost of raw materials pose challenges to his business.

His desire is to buy modern machines to improve the quality of his output. With this loan, Pidson intends to buy a metal-grinding machine.

loans.use: to buy a metal-grinding machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sandals wholesale.
